module.description: Call Data Record report tools for viewing reports of your calls
module.name: CDR Reports
module.changelog: *16.0.13* FREEI-3939 and FREEI-4209 *16.0.12* FREEI-3939 Added new input variables to query the CDR data by datetime range with unit test cases *16.0.11* FREEI-3939 Refactored gql api to fetch all cdr's and added unit test cases *16.0.10* FREEPBX-22979 *16.0.9* FREEI-3509 D-phone API for call_log takes time to show the entry *16.0.8* FREEI-3446 getWidgetListByModule *16.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-8633 Added ", recordingfile, linkedid, peeraccount, *16.0.6* Packaging of ver 16.0.6 *16.0.5* FREEI-2660 UCC timestamp mismatch on main CDR module *16.0.4* FREEI-2099 extensions name shown incorrectly. *16.0.3* FREEPBX-21776: User Edit > UCP > Call History > CDR Access > not displayed correctly *16.0.2* database port missing *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
